"...Hm? Ah, <%me>.":
"What are you doing
all the way out here?"
"Just checking out the situation."
"What about you?"

"Your continued assistance with
the war effort is most appreciated."

"We wouldn't be capable of full
coverage of Stia with our numbers alone."
"I'm currently on patrol duty."

"Many enemies yet remain
all throughout Stia."
"Considerably powerful enemies continue to lurk in this area in particular."

"Certainly a perilous place
for any inexperienced ARKS."

"...Still, I never would've thought
such a gigantic structure was down here..."
"I was shocked as well."
"Did you know something was down here?"
"So Crawford didn't give you an explanation in advance?"

"I see... Perhaps he wasn't sure if
his information was reliable."

"No, we weren't aware of it until
Crawford brought us the information."

"This place was just our final
objective, as it was yours."

"However, our goal was merely
to gain control of the area."

"We figured a strong enemy was lurking here,
but we never expected it to be Dark Falz."

"If we had stormed into that place without your support,
there's no telling what could've happened..."
"Ah, speaking of which, I haven't mentioned this yet."

"While inside the central region, our investigation team
found some data regarding Dark Falz."

"According to the reports, apparently Dark Falz was
collecting combat data from all throughout Halpha."
"...Of its own volition?"
"...On someone's orders?"
"That... we do not know."

"That raises the question of
\"If so, then on whose orders?\""
"The details are unclear, but..."

"There is little doubt that
Dark Falz has been studying how ARKS fight."

"If left unattended, he could become
an even more formidable opponent."

"Perhaps I should say that it's a
good thing we got to it now and not later..."

"I will relay this information
to Crawford as well."

"I'm sure he will be able
to find a solution."

"It will take some time, but we intend to
continue our investigations in this area."

"...Ah, my apologies. This has become
a rather long conversation."
"I shall return to my mission."
"May we meet again soon."
